message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $800000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $700000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $700000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counteroffer at $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your counteroffer, so I'll offer $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
